## 76. MARRY (AS MAN)
### Definition
To enter marriage from the perspective of a man. (Concepticon)Transitive verb, often expressed by an idiomatic construction. Intransitive ‘marry’ with a plural subject may be different; context no. 3 is included to differentiate between the two.

### Contexts
1. Muhammad married Khadija when he was 25. 2. Nowadays men marry only after they are 25 years old. 3. Muhammad and Patimat got married / will get married soon.
